title: Door-to-door sales
context: [ยง481H-6] Door-to-door sales. No door-to-door sales of water treatment units shall be permitted unless a copy of data, claims, and information on water quality and health effects, as used in the sales presentation, are made a part of the contract. As used in this section, &ldquo;data, claims, and information&rdquo; includes but is not limited to, graphs, charts, news clippings, and other supporting information. [L 1991, c 260, pt of ยง1]
